controller.musicplayer

Interface MusicPlayer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Observable, Player
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMusicPlayer, ClassicMusicPlayer, LoopableMusicPlayer

    public interface MusicPlayer
extends Player, Observable
    A music player is something that take different format song from a playlist and reproduce them This interface extends the interface Player and Observable
    Author:
    Matteo Gabellini

        java.util.Optional<java.net.URL> getCurrentSong()
        a getter for the current song
        Returns:

      • getCurrentSongInfosManager

        java.util.Optional<SongInfosManager> getCurrentSongInfosManager()
        Take the informations of the possible current song in reproduction
        Returns:
        An optional with the information of the song in reproduction otherwise an Optional.empty() if there isn't
